casebody.data:
ELI GLOBAL, LLC, et al.
v.
HEAVNER 12PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 14, 2017 Matthew N. Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Kip David Nelson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Kendal B. Reed, Attorney at Law, for Eli Global, LLC, et al. James H. Hughes, Attorney at Law, Richard M. Hutson, II, Attorney at Law, Durham, Edward Joseph Blocher, Jr., Attorney at Law, Hampton Y. Dellinger, Attorney at Law, for Heavner, James A. Charles F. Marshall, III, Attorney at Law, Mark J. Prak, Attorney at Law, Timothy Nelson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for NC Association of Broadcasters, et al. Stuart M. Paynter, Attorney at Law, Celeste H. G. Boyd, Attorney at Law, Hillsborough, for Chapel Hill-Carrboro Chamber of Commerce.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th of June 2017 by Plaintiffs to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of June 2017."
